summary: "Over the Rainbow" is a famous song from the 1939 movie *The Wizard of Oz*. Written by Harold Arlen and Yip Harburg, it won an Academy Award and became Judy Garland's signature song. In the film, Dorothy (played by Garland) sings it when she's feeling sad and wishes to escape her boring life. She imagines a magical place "over the rainbow" where all her dreams come true. This song is a classic and reminds us to dream big and hope for a better future.
title: Over the Rainbow
